page.title: 14Stretton Handley CE Primary
page.content: {Stretton Handley CE Primary School}has three teachers and 37 children. Over the years the number of children has fallen and next year we will have only 2.2 teachers including the headmaster. There are less than 10 children from Woolley now and most children come to school by car. Here are some{infant children's views: When I go to school my favourite thing is Phonic Workbook and Reading Workshop. My teacher is Mrs.Hall and I especially like P.E. and I like coming to school. In the school concert I was the Mad Hatter and I had to learn lots of words. It was after tea and lots of people came. I like playtime because I like playing with Luke with my football.I like P.E. because I like swinging on ropes and hanging upside down.
